thread.title: TOWIE newbie Amber Turner confirms she's dating Dan Edgar as she blasts 'disrespectful' ex Jamie Reed
thread.title_full: TOWIE newbie Amber Turner confirms she's dating Dan Edgar as she blasts 'disrespectful' ex Jamie Reed

author: Hayley Minn
title: TOWIE newbie Amber Turner confirms she's dating Dan Edgar as she blasts 'disrespectful' ex Jamie Reed
text:
TOWIE newbie Amber Turner confirms she's dating Dan Edgar as she blasts 'disrespectful' ex Jamie Reed Megan Mckenna's best friend revealed all in an exclusive chat with Mirror TV Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
Amber Turner has confirmed she and Dan Edgar are dating, following TOWIE viewers seeing her end her four and a half year relationship with Jamie Reed in last night's episode. 
The ITVBe show newcomers have been plagued with rumours she and Dan got together in Tenerife. 
But, while she insists nothing happened the night Liam Gatsby has brought into question, Megan Mckenna's best friend has confessed things have progressed between Kate Wright's ex and herself. 
In an exclusive interview with Mirror TV, Amber revealed: "Since then, things have sort of happened - even though timing’s really poor. 
"You can’t plan timing when you start speaking to someone, but we are talking a little bit." Read More Amber Turner is dating Dan Edgar (Photo: ITV Picture Desk) Dan Edgar recently got out of a relationship with Kate Wright (Photo: ITV Picture Desk) Jamie and Amber were dating for four and a half years (Photo: Jamiereed_/Instagram) 
However, Amber went on to insist they're taking things slowly, adding: "It’s not serious. 
"I’ve just come out of a long-term relatrionship and so has he, I’m not looking to get back into a relationship or anything like that, but we are enjoying each other’s company. 
"It’s not been something that’s been planned. I could never have planned for this to happen. 
"It’s all a shock to me as well. Things haven’t worked out the way I thought they would. You can’t predict the future." 
After they broke up with each other, Jamie has pinned a quote to the top of his Twitter page which reads: "If you succeed in cheating someone...Don't think that the person is a fool. Realize that the person trusted you more than you deserved!!!" 
He's also retweeted a fan, who wrote: "Just caught up on Towie , omg how could you do that to Jamie Reed he's lush (sic)." Read More Jamie Reed has been retweeting cryptic messages about cheating (Photo: ITV Picture Desk) Jamie and Amber broke up in last night's episode (Photo: FameFlynet) 
And Amber isn't impressed with his behaviour on social media. 
She told us: "I do want to say we’re on good terms now, but he’s a bit more angry and upset about things, and the way he’s handled things I don’t think has been that nice. 
"He’s been retweeting and favouriting stuff, and posting cryptic things about cheating. 
"It’s a bit disrespectful. I’ve not done any of that." 
*TOWIE continues on ITVBe on Sunday at 10pm Like us on Facebook
